text: I think the reaction of Africa should
have been faster and they should have
come out condemning this very very
actively I also believe that the
Nigerian government should have shared a
bit more with his own population and I
believe now it is very clear that all
security forces should be used to try to
relieve security forces should be used
to try to free these girls and I would
hope they would also work to gain the
confidence of the people so that they
would also work with the police and
becomes people's policing where they
cooperate and and and help if the people
are alienated from the security forces
they are not going to get any help from
them I'm grateful that the US UK and
others have offered help you need to
work across international borders to be
able to contain terrorists and deny them
the opportunities so do you think Boko
Haram now poses an international threat
we have a porous air region it's very
easy in Africa and in West Africa to
cross from one country to the other from
the moment they are moving across
Nigerian borders to Cameroon Tunisia and
others they are international and even
if they don't move across the airport
they are picking up all the Nationals is
not just Nigerians and so it is a threat
to all of us do you feel the Nigerian
government has a grip on the situation
it's a difficult question to answer in
the sense that the issue the I deal with
is a complex one and it it will have to
be done and tackled on various fronts
we've dealt with a question of
international cooperation working with
all this Nigeria is a big and a dynamic
country it has some really very
clever people and i really believe that
the the government and the people of
Nigeria should be able to get their act
together to contain Bukhara and assure
security and stability up for the
country but I mean if the government
really in control well the government
says is doing everything that it can but
the results are not in yet and the
people need to be reassured that not
only the government is doing everything
it can but is going to yield results
